entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Toronto Island
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 2:39 PM EST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, 2.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Toronto City Centre Airport 3:42 PM EST Monday 23 January 2023
Condition: Cloudy
Temperature: 2.2°C
Pressure: 101.2 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 67 %
Dewpoint: -3.2°C
Wind: WNW 32 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday night: Flurries. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Flurries beginning before morning. Local amount 2 cm. Wind becoming west 30 km/h late this evening. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High plus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: Flurries ending early in the morning then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light late in the afternoon. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 7 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 7.
